messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Nancy
messages.msgSnippet: Good one, Nancy. How does one reply to such an accusation? That s the ultimate silencer. Bob
messages.messageBody:
Good one, Nancy. How does one reply to such an accusation? That's the
ultimate silencer.

Bob>><<


Try thinking instead of replying. I thought Nancy was right on about her
point.
~Elissa Cleaveland
An unlesson'd girl, unschool'd, unpractic'd;
Happy in this, she is not so old
But she may learn.
W.S. The Merchant of Venice III, ii, 160
